message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm making a counteroffer of $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $950000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $950000 and $1050000, so I'll make an offer of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1075000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm starting to get close to my maximum budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1075000 and my maximum budget of $800000, so I'll make an offer of $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $925000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to both of us.

I'm willing to make one last offer. I'm not willing to go above $950000, and I think that's already a generous offer considering the product's value to me. I'd like to buy the product for $950000. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to consider buying from John for $800000.
